recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh, crisp salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
preparation_steps: Chop the romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Tasty beef tacos with a variety of toppings.
preparation_steps: Cook the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water according to the packet instructions.
Simmer for a few minutes until the sauce thickens.
Fill taco shells with the beef mixture and top with lettuce
tomatoes
cheese
sour cream
and salsa.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful chicken curry with a rich, spicy sauce.
preparation_steps: In a large pot, sauté the onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add the coconut milk and chicken broth, and bring to a simmer.
Cook for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for a weekend breakfast.
preparation_steps: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and grease lightly with butter.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook until golden brown on the other side.
Serve with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: A hearty and cheesy lasagna with layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese.
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions.
In a large skillet
cook the ground beef
onion
and garlic until browned.
Stir in the marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
In a bowl
mix together the ricotta cheese
1 1/2 cups mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
egg
parsley
salt
and pepper.
Spread a thin layer of meat sauce in the bottom of a baking dish.
Layer with lasagna noodles
cheese mixture
and meat sauce. Repeat layers.
Top with remaining mozzarella cheese.
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes.
Let cool for 15 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy chicken Alfredo pasta with a rich and cheesy sauce.
preparation_steps: Cook the fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook until fragrant.
Stir in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Add the Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and smooth.
Add the cooked chicken and pasta to the skillet and toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.title: Plov
recipes.description: National food of Azerbaijani cuisine
preparation_steps: step1
step2
step3

recipes.title: Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
preparation_steps: Boil the spaghetti in salted water according to the package instructions.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl
then add the grated cheeses and mix well.
Drain the spaghetti and return to the pot. Add the pancetta and mix well.
Remove from heat and quickly add the egg and cheese mixture
stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce.
Season with freshly ground black pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.
preparation_steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the bell peppers
broccoli
carrots
zucchini
and garlic
and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
In a small bowl
whisk together the soy sauce
hoisin sauce
cornstarch
and water.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to coat.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes
or until the sauce has thickened.
Serve the stir fry over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Dolma
recipes.description: National food of Azerbaijani cuisine
preparation_steps: step1
step2
step3

recipes.title: Baklava
recipes.description: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened and held together with syrup or honey.
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Butter the bottom and sides of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Layer 10 sheets of phyllo dough in the dish
brushing each sheet with melted butter.
In a bowl
mix together the chopped nuts and cinnamon.
Sprinkle a layer of the nut mixture over the phyllo dough.
Repeat the layers until all the nut mixture is used
ending with a top layer of phyllo dough.
Cut the baklava into diamond shapes using a sharp knife.
Bake for 50-60 minutes
or until golden brown and crisp.
While the baklava is baking
combine the water
sugar
vanilla extract
and honey in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes.
Pour the hot syrup over the hot baklava
and let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Sushi
recipes.description: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.
ingredients: Assorted fillings (e.g., fish, avocado, cucumber, crab)
preparation_steps: Rinse the sushi rice in a fine-mesh strainer until the water runs clear.
Combine the rice and water in a rice cooker and cook according to the manufacturer's instructions.
In a small saucepan
combine the rice vinegar
sugar
and salt. Heat over low heat until the sugar dissolves.
Transfer the cooked rice to a large bowl and fold in the vinegar mixture.
Let the rice cool to room temperature.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat
and spread a thin layer of rice over the nori
leaving a 1-inch border at the top.
Arrange the fillings in a line across the center of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat
and seal the edge with a little water.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce
wasabi
and pickled ginger.

recipes.title: Vietnamese Pho
recipes.description: Traditional Vietnamese noodle soup with rich broth and herbs.
preparation_steps: Simmer bones with spices for 6-8 hours to make broth.
Cook rice noodles according to package.
Prepare herb plate with basil, sprouts, and lime.
Assemble bowls with noodles and raw beef slices.
Pour hot broth over to cook beef.
Serve with herbs and sauces.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic French soup with caramelized onions and melted cheese.
preparation_steps: Slowly caramelize onions for 1 hour.
Add wine and reduce.
Add broth and herbs, simmer for 30 minutes.
Toast bread slices.
Fill bowls with soup, top with bread and cheese.
Broil until cheese is bubbly and brown.

recipes.title: Tandoori Chicken
recipes.description: Indian-style yogurt marinated chicken cooked in high heat.
preparation_steps: Make marinade with yogurt and spices.
Marinate chicken for 4-24 hours.
Preheat oven to 450°F.
Cook chicken, basting occasionally.
Finish under broiler for char.
Serve with mint chutney and naan.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: Aromatic coconut curry with vegetables and chicken.
preparation_steps: Fry curry paste in coconut cream.
Add chicken and cook through.
Add remaining coconut milk and vegetables.
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Finish with Thai basil.

recipes.title: Chocolate Soufflé
recipes.description: Light and airy chocolate dessert that rises dramatically.
preparation_steps: Prepare ramekins with butter and sugar.
Melt chocolate and butter.
Separate eggs and make base mixture.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks.
Fold whites into chocolate base.
Fill ramekins and bake immediately.
Serve right away with powdered sugar.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Luxurious dish of beef tenderloin wrapped in pastry.
preparation_steps: Sear beef and coat with mustard.
Make mushroom duxelles.
Layer prosciutto and duxelles.
Wrap beef in pastry.
Chill thoroughly.
Brush with egg wash and score.
Bake until golden and desired doneness.

recipes.title: Pumpkin pie
recipes.description: Pie made with pumpkin
preparation_steps: make biscuit
make cream
combine

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers.
preparation_steps: Prepare strong coffee and let cool.
Make mascarpone cream mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture.
Layer cookies and cream mixture.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa before serving
